channel.title: Workshops on Social Data Science 2022
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Social Data Science 2022

item.title: Day 1
item.description: Practical info Place: Ovnhallen Time: 11.40-17.00 Power supply in this venue has been known to be sub-optimal. Have a charged computer with you. Perhaps, consider bringing a power-splitter / extender. Schedule for the day Time Activity Data Session 1 11.40-12.30 Focus on DataViz mixed Session 2 13.00-14.15 Focus on UML Digital Nomads Session 3 14.30-15.30 Interactive DataViz AirBnb Session 4 15.45-15.45 DataViz Groupwork mixed 16.45-17.00 Wrapping up the day mixed Datasets & Context Digital Nomad Dataset In this workshop we are going to explore the nomad data using unsupervised ML techniques.
